EXPECTED_A_VALID_ID.name: Expected a valid ID
EXPECTED_A_VALID_ID.message: IDs must be integers between 0 and 2.147.483.647

YOU_MUST_INSERT_THE_ACTUAL_PASSWORD.name: You must insert your current password

THE_PASSWORD_DOES_NOT_MATCH.name: The entered password does not match the current one

THE_PASSWORD_MUST_HAVE_AT_LEAST_8_CHARAC.name: Your password must have at least 8 characters

THE_PASSWORD_MUST_HAVE_AT_LEAST_ONE_NUMB.name: The password must contain at least 1 number

THE_PASSWORD_MUST_HAVE_AT_LEAST_ONE_LETT.name: The password must contain at least 1 letter

THE_PASSWORD_MUST_HAVE_AT_LEAST_ONE_SPEC.name: The password must contain at least 1 special character

THE_EMAIL_SENDED_ISNT_VALID.name: The email sent is not valid

CELLPHONE_NUMBERS_MUST_HAVE_THE_9_DIGIT.name: Phone numbers must have the 9 digit

THE_CELLPHONE_NUMBER_MUST_HAVE_ONLY_DIGI.name: The phone number must have only digits

THE_PIX_KEY_INSERTED_ISNT_VALID.name: The inserted PIX key is not valid
THE_PIX_KEY_INSERTED_ISNT_VALID.message: Accepts CPF, email, phone, and random key

THE_ONLY_ACCEPTED_PROTOCOL_IS_HTTPS.name: The only accepted protocol is HTTPS

THE_URL_EXTENSION_ISNT_ACCEPTED_YET.name: This URL extension isn't accepted yet
THE_URL_EXTENSION_ISNT_ACCEPTED_YET.message: You can recommend adding this extension to our support server.

THE_URL_IS_INACCESSIBLE_BY_THE_WEBHOOK_S.name: The URL is inaccessible by the webhook server
THE_URL_IS_INACCESSIBLE_BY_THE_WEBHOOK_S.message: We didn't receive any response from the URL

THE_URL_WOULD_NOT_HAVE_REDIRECTS.name: The URL should not have redirects

THE_URL_HAS_TIMEOUT_5S.name: The URL exceeded the timeout (5s)
THE_URL_HAS_TIMEOUT_5S.message: It's essential that the server responds in less than 5 seconds

YOU_NEED_TO_INSERT_AT_LEAST_1_ITEM.name: You need to insert at least 1 item
YOU_NEED_TO_INSERT_AT_LEAST_1_ITEM.message: Add an item to the order.

ONE_PROVIDED_PRODUCT_IS_OUT_OF_STOCK.name: One provided product is out of stock

WE_DONT_HAVE_THIS_AMOUNT_IN_STOCK.name: We don't have this amount in stock
WE_DONT_HAVE_THIS_AMOUNT_IN_STOCK.message: Reduce the quantity or try again later.

THIS_SELLER_WAS_BANNED_FROM_ZENNIFY.name: This seller was banned from Zennify

WE_DO_NOT_YET_SUPPORT_MULTIPLE_USER_PROD.name: We do not yet support multiple user products
WE_DO_NOT_YET_SUPPORT_MULTIPLE_USER_PROD.message: Add items from one seller at a time.

WE_DO_NOT_YET_SUPPORT_MULTIPLE_STORE_PRO.name: We do not yet support multiple store products
WE_DO_NOT_YET_SUPPORT_MULTIPLE_STORE_PRO.message: Add items from one store at a time.

YOU_ALREADY_HAVE_ANOTHER_ORDER_WAITING_P.name: You already have another order waiting for payment
YOU_ALREADY_HAVE_ANOTHER_ORDER_WAITING_P.message: Complete the other order before placing a new one.

YOU_INSERTED_AN_INVALID_ADDITIONAL.name: You inserted an invalid additional
YOU_INSERTED_AN_INVALID_ADDITIONAL.message: Check and correct the additional items.

THIS_SELLER_HAS_NOT_YET_CONFIGURED_RECEI.name: This seller has not yet configured receipt via PIX
THIS_SELLER_HAS_NOT_YET_CONFIGURED_RECEI.message: Choose another method or wait for seller configuration.

THIS_SELLER_HAS_NOT_YET_CONFIGURED_RECEI.name: This seller has not yet configured receipt via BOLETO
THIS_SELLER_HAS_NOT_YET_CONFIGURED_RECEI.message: Choose another method or wait for seller configuration.

THIS_SELLER_HAS_NOT_YET_CONFIGURED_RECEI.name: This seller has not yet configured receipt via CRYPTO
THIS_SELLER_HAS_NOT_YET_CONFIGURED_RECEI.message: Choose another method or wait for seller configuration.

THIS_SELLER_HAS_NOT_YET_CONFIGURED_RECEI.name: This seller has not yet configured receipt via VISA
THIS_SELLER_HAS_NOT_YET_CONFIGURED_RECEI.message: Choose another method or wait for seller configuration.

THIS_COUPON_REACHED_THE_USE_LIMIT.name: This coupon reached the use limit

YOU_NEED_TO_SELECT_MORE_ITENS_DO_REACH_T.name: You need to select more items to reach the minimum value of the coupon
YOU_NEED_TO_SELECT_MORE_ITENS_DO_REACH_T.message: Add more items to the cart.

THIS_COUPON_IS_VALID_ONLY_FOR_THE_FIRST_.name: This coupon is valid only for the first purchase
THIS_COUPON_IS_VALID_ONLY_FOR_THE_FIRST_.message: Coupon valid only on the first purchase.

UNKNOWN_STORE.name: Unknown store
UNKNOWN_STORE.message: Perhaps this store no longer exists.

INVALID_STORE_NAME.name: Invalid store name
INVALID_STORE_NAME.message: The name must be up to 50 characters

UNKNOWN_PRODUCT.name: Unknown product
UNKNOWN_PRODUCT.message: Perhaps this product no longer exists.

YOU_REACHED_THE_PRODUCT_LIMIT.name: You reached the product limit of 100
YOU_REACHED_THE_PRODUCT_LIMIT.message: Try removing products you no longer use.

THIS_PRODUCT_NAME_ALREADY_EXIST.name: There is already a product with this name

INVALID_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_FOR_DISCORD.name: Invalid product description for Discord
INVALID_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION_FOR_DISCORD.message: Try submitting a description with fewer than 1024 characters

UNKNOWN_STOCK.name: The item does not exist in the stock
UNKNOWN_STOCK.message: It may have already been sold

INVALID_STOCK_CONTENT.name: Invalid item content
INVALID_STOCK_CONTENT.message: It must have up to 1000 characters

INVALID_STOCK_COST.name: Invalid item cost
INVALID_STOCK_COST.message: It must be between R$ 0.00 and R$ 999,999.00

UNKNOWN_FILE.name: Unknown file
UNKNOWN_FILE.message: Perhaps it has already been deleted

INVALID_FILE_TYPE.name: Invalid file type
INVALID_FILE_TYPE.message: Accepted types are PNG, WEBP, JPEG, and GIF

YOU_ALREADY_HAVE_THIS_MEDIA.name: You already have this image saved in Zennify
YOU_ALREADY_HAVE_THIS_MEDIA.message: We blocked the submission to prevent duplicate images

YOU_ALREADY_HAVE_ANOTHER_IMAGE_WITH_THIS.name: You already have another image with this same name

UNKNOWN_PANEL.name: Unknown panel
UNKNOWN_PANEL.message: Perhaps this panel no longer exists.

INVALID_PANEL_PLACEHOLDER.name: Invalid panel placeholder
INVALID_PANEL_PLACEHOLDER.message: It must have up to 150 characters

YOU_REACHED_PANEL_LIMIT.name: You reached the panel limit of 30
YOU_REACHED_PANEL_LIMIT.message: Try removing panels you no longer use.

YOU_ALREADY_HAVE_ANOTHER_PANEL_WITH_THIS.name: You already have another panel with this name

YOU_REACHED_THE_PRODUCTS_LIMIT_ON_PANEL.name: You've reached the products limit on the panel
YOU_REACHED_THE_PRODUCTS_LIMIT_ON_PANEL.message: Due to Discord limitations, only up to 25 products are allowed.
